WebDisgn.p: Frontend magician! I'm Monu, turning visions into pixel-perfect reality. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, my passion lies in crafting sleek, user-centric websites. Let's collaborate on your next project! #WebDev #FrontendMagic

Calculator.p: Designed and implemented a dynamic and user-friendly calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing my proficiency in front-end development and passion for creating intuitive and engaging web applications.

Play Games.p: Successfully crafted an interactive and visually appealing game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, demonstrating a keen eye for design, strong coding abilities, and a passion for creating engaging user experiences in the realm of web-based gaming.

Video Editing.p: Passionate video editor here, transforming concepts into cinematic masterpieces. Proficient in (davinci resolve, openshot , kinemaster , pwerdirector...) I specialize in visual storytelling that captivates. Let's bring your story to life! #VideoEditing #VisualStorytelle

Robotics.p: I had worked on many projects like remote control cars, Gesture control wheelchair,boat, helicopters, humanoid robot and also many projects based on aurdino, esp microcontrollers and sensors...

Our Youtube channel.p: I had also started a youtube channel with my friends, you feel free to reach-out our channel link is mentioned below...

Products 0.p: We're on a mission to make a difference. Through our innovative services and commitment to social responsibility, we're creating positive change in communities around the world.

Product 01.p: Mental health solver services by Monadnocks where we prioritise your health more than anything.

Product 02.p: Whack-a-Mole is a fun game where players hit moles popping out of holes using a mallet. The goal is to score points by hitting as many moles as possible within a time limit. It tests reflexes and coordination, offering simple and engaging gameplay for all ages.

Product 03.p: Catch the Ball is a web game where players score by clicking yellow balls, avoid red balls, and collect green power-ups. It features a rulebook, pause/resume controls, and score tracking, with increasing difficulty for a dynamic, engaging experience.

Game1.About: Whack-a-Mole is a fun game where players hit moles popping out of holes using a mallet. The goal is to score points by hitting as many moles as possible within a time limit. It tests reflexes and coordination, offering simple and engaging gameplay for all ages.

Game2.About: Catch the Ball is a web game where players score by clicking yellow balls, avoid red balls, and collect green power-ups. It features a rulebook, pause/resume controls, and score tracking, with increasing difficulty for a dynamic, engaging experience.

Game3.About: Space Burger is an arcade-style game where players catch falling burger ingredients while dodging obstacles. Using arrow keys, players aim to build high scores across multiple levels, each introducing new challenges and increasing difficulty.
